divs: Sighting DetailsThis report was telephoned into MUFON and left on an answering machine. The Witness is a retired police detective. He was taking his dog out at 9:00 P.M. CDT on Monday, November 17, 2008 when he noticed 4 or 5 bright yellow-orange lights in the sky arranged in a straight row. He estimates the altitude at 5,000 feet and the lights were silent. He also observed a number of military jets also flying in the area (making lots of noise) but at higher altitude (15 - 20,000 feet). On Tuesday, November 18, 2008 (also at 9:00 P.M. CDT), he observed 3 to 4 more orange lights in the sky for a few seconds before they disappeared. There were military jets in the air on the second night as well. The Witness does not have a home computer and does not have an email address.
Summary: 4 - 5 orange lights w/Air Force jets near.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Oxford
There were no other sightings in Oxford on or around November 17th 2008
